Dear Tarek/Hagop

 

Trust all is well,

 

We would like draw your attention on the outstanding balance below balance which is mostly due from Nov 2024, insurance company is seriously suffering as below

 

1.	As per regulator they need to provide bad debts provision of 45% on this outstanding amount which is negatively impacting their profitability
2.	They have funded amount by paying VAT and Reinsurance share due to PPW
3.	Net cash flow from outstanding balance

1.	As per regulator they need to provide bad debts provision of 45% on this outstanding amount which is negatively impacting their profitability
2.	They have funded amount by paying VAT and Reinsurance share due to PPW
3.	Net cash flow from outstanding balance

 

We need you’re your urgent attention and support to arrange your internal coordination to settle the amount in next few days that will help us reduce the suffering of our mutual stakeholder.

 

Thanks and regards,

 

Abdul Hafeez Tanwari
